text: The Stepping Stones are three prominent rocks lying north of Limitrophe Island, off the southwest coast of Anvers Island, Antarctica. The Stepping Stones are located at . The Stepping Stones form one of a series of small boat refuges for parties working between nearby Palmer Station and Biscoe Bay, and therefore form "stepping stones" for coastal trips. Named by Palmer Station personnel in 1972. ==See also== * List of Antarctic and sub-Antarctic islands ==References== Category:Islands of the Palmer Archipelago
title: Stepping Stones (islands)
